Text: For the people wondering, this is no ENB Series graphics enhancer. But a custom written DX11 renderer for the Unreal Engine.

Hey you have some nice looking torrents, great old school collections when games where games and not this BS we have now days where the game almost plays itself.

Don't get discouraged by these people who cry wolf for no reason other then their own ignorance. Which is total shit, I mean Vietcong was such a hardcore game as I recall.

I'm sure if you continue to upload more of the same quality collections then you will get more seeders and support.

@motley666:
The music is NOT RIPPED.
It is 100% Complete Unreal Gold + DX11 & TEXTURES.

@Lukegoodman:
You need this:
Microsoft Visual C++ 2010 Redistributable Package (x86)
http://www.microsoft.com/download/en/details.aspx?displaylang=en&id=5555

Otherwhise you might have to reinstall the DX11 Driver/Windows update again.

I've tested this on a other computer before uploading, and it worked like a charm.

Just extract it, Launch the Game, There is only 1 graphics driver remaining to choose, the DX 11 one.

If it doesnt work, its something on your computer thats needs installing/updating!

If you get a certain error, plz tell me what it is, ill try to help you guys!
